document.full_text: danielle adams scored 22 of her 30 points in a dominating second half, and texas a&m beat notre dame 76-70, winning its first national championship.
document.title: texas a&m 76, notre dame 70: aggies beat irish for first n.c.a.a. title
lines_and_colors: danielle adams scored 22 of her 30 points in a dominating second half, and texas a&m beat notre dame 76-70, winning its first national championship.
